Reviews.Title: Great value for the Money
Reviews.Author: Carguy100
Reviews.Content: These cameras work very well outside and even have protection for the cord to run thru the center of the arm and mounting flange so there is no exposed wiring like other brand cameras have.  Only caution is that night range in my experience is probably more like about 25 to 30 feet of usable range which is still better than some other cameras I have tried but not quite as much as I had expected.

Reviews.Title: Worked ok for 3 months
Reviews.Author: YA Book Reader "YA Book reader"
Reviews.Content: For 3 months they worked ok, nothing that great but for the price ok. Then one started to roll, the following day it stopped working a week later another one stopped working, now I only have two working, I have tried swapping them around, the two cameras have stopped working, should have got a better system.

Reviews.Title: Great cameras!
Reviews.Author: norah
Reviews.Content: We got a great deal on this during black friday(another retailer) at $200 including the dvr. My husband installed them and even though it was a lot of work to run all the wiring, it was well worth it. We put three cameras outdoors and one indoors(hidden inconspicuously next to something decorative because the cameras are a bit large) and they work. We hooked it up to view them on our TV, computer and iphone. I think we can only view on two of the three devices at a time, for example, TV and iphone or TV and PC, nevertheless, it works great. I can view from my iphone at any time and check on my teenaged child when home from school. Yes my child knows the camera is there, this is for security and peace of mind, not indoors spying:) But the passwords and operation of the cameras are strictly for me and my husband. The night vision view is a bit grainy but still good enough to see everything going on. Otherwise, indoors or during daylight outside, the view is awesome. With more than one dvr you can install even more cameras. The only downfall is that we can't pan or zoom, but these cameras work for our needs so it was not a deal breaker for us. If you are looking for those additional features, the cameras will be more expensive. I think this is a good purchase and I would highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: good for the price
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I have had these up and running for a week now and so far they are working nicely. Only problem is they don't show colors properly regardless of the settings. Dark colors appear light, ie black is pinkish on mine. Also something i didn't see posted anywhere is that the IR LED'S on these cameras glow red at night, I like that because people will see that you have them even in the dark. The mounts are good quality in my opinion.

Reviews.Title: night owl cams
Reviews.Author: tony
Reviews.Content: they are not as good as the ones we have. they are not very clear for night time. wish I would have checked around a little more.

Reviews.Title: night owl
Reviews.Author: hillbillygoat
Reviews.Content: They work great. I had no problem. The night vision coulld be better. I bought Qsee 1gig harddrive. Works great.,

Reviews.Title: Quality product.
Reviews.Author: Nancy J. Stucker
Reviews.Content: We started out with 4, later ordered another receiver for 16 channels and have at least 12 hooked up.  Works great for security viewing of our home.

Reviews.Title: Can go wrong
Reviews.Author: keri
Reviews.Content: I not have 8 of these and they are amazing! I highly recommend this to anyone who is loking for a good security system!

Reviews.Title: mrd
Reviews.Author: mrd
Reviews.Content: After some problems with some young people around my house, I purchased these cameras to keep an eye on them.Today  I connected the cameras just to try them out, and I was able to see everything going on around my house. I can not wait to install them for good. I think that these cameras are excellent, and for the money I am very happy.I think I will connect the to a dvd recorder for this time, and maybe in the future I will buy dvr.

Reviews.Title: Great for close range applications!
Reviews.Author: Taradath
Reviews.Content: Installed to view a location within 30 feet of the camera. Also installed another to view an entrance to a store room, it served this purpose quite well. Night vision works great, even with no light (pitch black). I'm using these cameras with one of those cheap H.264 dvr's (Zogis Brand), recording at 756x576 resolution (see pict for sample). For the price, it's worth it... small, light, night vision works great, easy installation. I'll give it five stars because mainly for the price, it's totally worth it, complete package deal, just add a stand alone dvr of your choice.

Reviews.Title: night owl security products
Reviews.Author: Andy
Reviews.Content: I got the 4 camera 3 work good except one is loose inside so I had to use my skill to fix it, but now it work fine, I have to fix it cuse don't want to bother for just loosed parts inside, that's all.

Reviews.Title: very bad product
Reviews.Author: Edward Mejia Uribe
Reviews.Content: Hellowas not aware of the poor quality of this product buy it thinking it would be a good acquisition, but after installation it stopped working about 4hr after installation.and to this day do not work, please take this into consideration to avoid losing customers.greetings.

Reviews.Title: OK, but look for something better.
Reviews.Author: Harry the Scrapper "Harry the Scrapper"
Reviews.Content: Kind of glitchy. I used them for outdoors, amd I would say maximum life span on the cameras is about 6 months.

Reviews.Title: poor quality
Reviews.Author: Terry Stanberry
Reviews.Content: i place two camera with no problems.  The other camera cable broke in half with very little slack.  No I have two broken cables.

Reviews.Title: Discrete Cameras
Reviews.Author: M. Williams "MBW"
Reviews.Content: My dad is obsessed with his security cameras so when they started going out, it was a really big deal. We bought these and they are a perfect fit. They are actually really discrete, so it doesn't look like you have a camcorder hanging out over your balcony or anything, they fit right in. They images they produce are great, however you have to account for the other things (cables, TV, etc) that help to give it such a great picture.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Ms M.
Reviews.Content: I bought night owl DVD with cam and I need some cam so I bought this , works great with my other cam .

Reviews.Title: Okay But
Reviews.Author: Ruso Minnifield "PrinceHappy2"
Reviews.Content: This product is Okay but I would rather see you buy a 700 TVL, Lines of Resolution, over the 420 TVL which is not as good.  They money vs the quality is just not there.  The product works but you can get a better bang for your money if you keep Lines of Resolution in mind as you purchase.

Reviews.Title: Work..sort of
Reviews.Author: Steve Jones
Reviews.Content: Do these cameras work, yes. But the video quality is terrible. Did I expect it to be top notch not by a long shot considering how much they cost but these are below par.

Reviews.Title: Night Owl is Great
Reviews.Author: Thomasia Slone
Reviews.Content: These cameras are great  i needed these to see what was going on outside of my house they have a great picture quilaty in both daytime and night

Reviews.Title: More than I expected
Reviews.Author: Emily carter
Reviews.Content: The quality of these cameras far out weigh the cost. Very sharp, clear image even in low light. If your in need of good cameras at a great price, look no further.

Reviews.Title: night vision no good and daytime color no good!!!
Reviews.Author: lloyd
Reviews.Content: On the display on the dvr ,U can even adjust the color in any way these are not good at all want to get my money back. Their not worth the money I spent.

Reviews.Title: You always get what you paid for! Paid cheap..got cheap product!
Reviews.Author: Annabelle Magsipoc
Reviews.Content: these was bought to add more cameras in my existing system... Three out of four of the cameras were so fuzzy and you can't identify an object especially when it turns dark... how I wish I can return these..and change it with probably a better ones...and no I won't recomend this product.

Reviews.Title: Security cameras
Reviews.Author: Julie Pospyhalla "Julie"
Reviews.Content: Workd great to keep an eye on corner areas you cannot see from windows.  Feel secure to be able to see what is around the corner.

Reviews.Title: Very poor night vision
Reviews.Author: Robert Martins
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this product at all I purchased the Night Owl 8 Camera Security system and all cameras not working after 2 yrs then replaced with Night Owl 4 camera pack that they say was improved but cameras have very poor night vision  ( non existent)..Update  None of the Cameras are working after 4 months of use. This product sucks...THis should get  a ZERO  rating

Reviews.Title: Very bad picture no matter how much you adjust settings.
Reviews.Author: Bdawg
Reviews.Content: I had originally bought the night k-84500 system with four cameras and like it still. But I bought these cameras to use the 8 camera capacity of the dvr and the picture is very inferior. I have adjusted all the settings and just came to realize that it's not the adjustments it's the product. Do yourself a favor and keep looking before purchasing these because you spend hours installing them and then they are bad quality.

Reviews.Title: Use your own mounting screws!
Reviews.Author: Darrell
Reviews.Content: The cameras are made in China like most security cameras on the U.S. market. No problem with camera's picture quality at all. Daylight images are great for the price. Night vision works as advertised and works even better if there is a structure in the viewing field of the camera. The LEDS will reflect the lighting to the target area. What made me select the Night Owl Security CM245 4-pack was the individual price per camera, which included a 60' BNC cord for each. The icing on the cake was Amazon's guarantee if the product was defective. I was however, very disappointed when I was ready to purchase another 4-pack and discovered the price dropped by twenty dollars. I explained to customer service I just purchased the product 13 days ago, but they said the price is the price. On the mounting screws..., use your own quality screws.

Reviews.Title: So-So
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a so so INDOOR security this one is ok. The cameras should not be used outdoors due to them being VERY unreliable in weather. For outdoor use consider an additional enclosure plus lighting/power protection at the camera end.

Reviews.Title: Overall is good
Reviews.Author: Nelson
Reviews.Content: It's to early for me to tell if it's going to last or not, but so far  installation/cpnfiguration went pretty easy, and the cameras are working fine, not to much resolution but for the price it does the job, I recomend to create a new e-mail address if you decide to activate the e-mail notification, since it will send you and e-mail every 10 minutes with the picture of the person who activate the sensor.Some people said they dont't last much, that will be another review...

Reviews.Title: Work well but some not functioning
Reviews.Author: James J Pascarella Jr
Reviews.Content: Ran all the line but 2 Cameras were not working. Checked lines with other cameras and line was good. Do not want to have to send all cameras back to get replacement..

Reviews.Title: Good Color
Reviews.Author: Evelin Caiafa
Reviews.Content: The cameras are clear during the day and the color are awesome.  The night vision is not as good.  The 45 feet does give a closer look at what you are looking at.  Overall the cameras are good.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Jdriv
Reviews.Content: I bought the 4 pack of these cameras and right out the box the night vision didn't work I had to pay shipping back to Night owl for them to replace them and when they returned them they forgot to return the 4 way power spliter so I had to wait for them to send me one. Last week we had a rain storm and water got inside one of the cameras witch are suppose to be water proof and they refuse to take care it it stating that it is an act of god. there ad states that it is weather proof to ip65 standards.

ProductInfo.Features:
Night vision up to 45'
Connects directly to your DVR
Compatible with all Night Owl Systems
400 TV lines of resolution
Vandal proof 3-axis bracket
Night Vision up to 45 feet in complete darkness
Indoor / Outdoor housing allows camera to withstand temperatures from 0 to 114 degrees Farenheight. Water and weather resistant.
3-Axis camera bracket for quick and easy mounting. Wires go thru inside of bracket and are not exposed for added security.
400 lines of resolution and connects easily to your TV or DVR with supplied connectors.
Lifetime Customer SupportAll Night Owl security products come with lifetime customer support via or website www.NightOwlSP(dot)com or by phone 1-866-390-1303
ProductInfo.Name: Night Owl Security CAM-4PK-CM245 4-Pack Color Wired Cameras with 45 Feet Night Vision, 240 Feet of Cable and Vandal Proof 3-Axis Mounting Brackets
